label: エッセイ（수필）
description: 개인적 경험이나 감정을 바탕으로 한 자율적이고 감성적인 글
instructions: Write in a reflective and expressive tone, using personal experience and emotional language. The flow can be intuitive but must have a clear thematic center.

label: コラム（칼럼）
description: 일상적 주제를 기반으로 사회적·문화적 통찰을 담는 짧은 논평형 글
instructions: Write a concise, opinionated piece that starts from a relatable observation and expands into a broader social or cultural critique.

label: 評論（비평문）
description: 사회·철학·예술적 주제에 대한 분석과 비판을 담은 이론적 글
instructions: Develop a critical and logical essay focusing on theoretical depth. Use analytical language to dissect the topic and present a coherent viewpoint.

label: 説明文（설명문）
description: 개념, 현상, 절차를 독자에게 알기 쉽게 설명하는 글
instructions: Present factual information in a clear and structured way. Avoid opinion; instead, focus on precise explanation and definition of concepts.

label: 論説文（논설문）
description: 주장과 근거를 통해 독자를 설득하는 목적의 논리적 글
instructions: State a clear thesis, support it with logical arguments and evidence, and conclude with a strong final statement. Aim to persuade the reader rationally.

label: 報告文（보고서）
description: 조사, 실험, 통계 등을 바탕으로 정보를 전달하는 분석형 문서
instructions: Present data or outcomes clearly and factually. Use a neutral tone, structured sections, and finish with a summary or implications.

label: 実用文（실용문）
description: 설명서, 공지문 등 실제 생활에 도움 되는 실용 정보 중심 글
instructions: Write in a practical and directive style, focusing on clarity and usability. Avoid emotion or opinion; emphasize steps or guidance.

label: 手記（기록문）
description: 특정 사건이나 체험을 시간 흐름에 따라 회상하는 글
instructions: Narrate a past experience from the first-person perspective with emotional depth and vivid description. Maintain coherence through temporal structure.

label: 会話文（대화 포함 글）
description: 상황 안에서 인물 간 간접적인 대화를 포함하는 설명적 글
instructions: Incorporate dialogue or interaction between characters naturally. Use this to reveal context, emotions, or implicit conflicts, rather than stating everything directly.
